title: Loving Hut - Valencia
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Chinese, Western, Buffet, Fast food, Take-out, Asian
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Offers an all-you-can-eat buffet with a large selection of food with tofu, seitan, pasta, rice, casserole, pizza, burgers, salad; plus cake, coffee, and non-alcoholic beverages. Prior to 2009 this had operated as Casa Salud.
streetAddress: Calle del Conde de Altea, 44, bajo Izquierda
